author: pintail_xyz
content: I suppose also the target reward is the big one, and since validators are contributing to finalizing the chain even if it takes a full 32 slots to be included, it seems fair that they should get that reward. The head vote is only valuable if included immediately so that only gets a reward if included immediately. The source vote on its own isn't valuable but if we're aiming for a stepped rewards scheme which incentivises prompt attestation, we might as well set the deadline in the "middle" of the head and target deadlines
